tool_description:
This is a simple API for use with bot integration or to create wordpress or other CMS plugins to show relevant quotes and quotations to display to the user.

Coming soon will be an ability to curate quotes and even add your own, that will be available via the same API.
name: Quotes
title: Quotes

api_list.name: /widget/~{search}.json
api_list.description: Search or get a random quote

required_parameters.name: search
required_parameters.description: Search term. Use dash(-) instead of space and must be lower case.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yusufnb-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/widget/~einstein.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yusufnb-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yusufnb-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/widget/~{search}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yusufnb-quotes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
